Night Mode Extension
Description:
Transform your browsing experience with the Night Mode Extension! This handy tool allows you to switch any website to a dark theme, reducing eye strain during late-night reading or browsing.

Features:

Toggle Night Mode: Easily switch between day and night modes with a single click from the extension popup.
Comprehensive Styling: Applies a full dark theme, including background color and text color adjustments, to enhance readability on various websites.
Persistent State: Automatically remembers your night mode preference across sessions for seamless user experience.
How It Works:

Activate Night Mode: Click the extension icon to toggle night mode on or off.
Dynamic Styling: The extension injects custom styles to adjust background colors, text colors, and borders to ensure a comfortable reading experience.
Adaptive: Night mode applies to most websites, avoiding issues with restricted or special URLs.
Permissions:

Active Tab: Allows the extension to access the content of the current tab for applying night mode.
Storage: Saves user preferences for night mode to ensure consistent experience.
Compatibility:

Works on all standard web pages. Note that some specialized pages or restricted URLs (e.g., chrome://, about:, or chrome-extension://) might not fully support the night mode changes.
